title: Mila no Multiverso
overview: Mila receives as a gift on her sixteenth birthday a device that can take her to visit parallel universes in search of her mother, Elis. Mila will need to adapt quickly to the challenges, and with the help of her friends Juliana, Vin√≠cius and Pierre, she will go in search of her mother, thus living the most incredible adventure in the exploration of the vast multiverse.
